This is MKV format. Non standard and awkward to burn correctly.
Not fake and excellent quality, thanks for the seed.

MKV is pretty much standard now. You can use mkv2vob to remux it, then burn it to play on the ps3.

See here if you want more info: http://forum.doom9.org/showthread.php?t=131782
